metadata.title: CVE-2024-28568 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in open source FreeImage v.3.19.0 [r1909]allows a local attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) via theread_iptc_profile() function when reading images in TIFF format.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
